introZh: 围绕单幅图像反射去除（SIRR）与场景分层，打造高效工具链，实现真实场景的清晰重建。
introEn: Tackles single-image reflection removal and layered decomposition with efficient toolchains.

titleZh: 极端条件下的图像增强
introZh: 研究恶劣天气与低光照退化建模，开发 MODEM 等视觉恢复方法，提升复杂环境成像质量。
introEn: Models adverse weather and low-light degradations to deliver robust restoration in the wild.

introZh: 以扩散模型和联合解码器为核心，构建真实场景中文本区域的高保真生成能力。
introEn: Text-faithful image synthesis and SR built on diffusion with joint decoders.

titleZh: 鲁棒视频理解与跨域感知
introZh: 聚焦高效视频目标检测与差异化对齐策略，提升跨场景泛化与实时感知能力。
introEn: Efficient video detection and adaptive alignment for real-time cross-domain perception.
